name: Die Die Dice
description:
Dice games have had enough being ridiculed by "smart" games! Now the dice roll for the chess pieces. 

Clear hordes of chess pieces and hunt down their Queen with your trusty straight-six shooter. Each time you reload, the dice roll anew and give you new bullets. Use special die skills to clear large amounts of enemies in one fell swoop. How long can you survive in this endless horror?

Made together with Ackrad (https://ackrad.itch.io/).

HOW TO PLAY

WASD -> Move

Shift -> Dash

Left Click -> Shoot

R -> Reload

Q, E -> Special Die Skills

Tab -> See Enemy Weaknesses

Every enemy type has certain dice they are weak against.

Pawn -> Any

Knight -> Odd Dice (1, 3, 5)

Bishop -> Even Dice (2, 4, 6)

Rook -> Less Than 3

King -> More Than 4

Queen -> Changes every time it's shot
